text.text_translated: NASA is now working to find and record smaller **asteroids**. **Asteroids** are large rocks that travel through space. They are looking for asteroids that are 140 metres wide or more. NASA believes there are about 25,000 asteroids of this size. However, they have only recorded about 8,000 of them, so 17,000 have not been found yet. This is a serious issue. In 2013, a much smaller asteroid exploded over a city in Russia. It was only 19 metres wide, but it injured 1,200 people. So, these middle-sized asteroids are a great danger if they enter the area around Earth.
